legacy.full_text:
New Canton Fair, new expectations! In April this year,
global buyers will gather in Guangzhou to witness the
splendor of the venue expansion of the #CantonFair. 
Just visit： https://t.co/qAkjpHyDXE https://t.co/o4NCYPUNPZ

legacy.full_text: The Ukraine crisis is a tragedy that could have been avoided. But it has come to where it stands today. There are hard lessons that all parties should truly reflect upon. https://t.co/orc0koUwWt

legacy.description: The official account of the Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in Vancouver
legacy.name: Chinese Consulate General in Vancouver

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: If the US truly expects a peaceful Taiwan Strait, it should stop containing China by exploiting the Taiwan question, r…

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: If the US truly expects a peaceful Taiwan Strait, it should stop containing China by exploiting the Taiwan question, return to the fundamental of the one-China principle, honor its political commitment to China, and unequivocally oppose and forestall Taiwan independence.

legacy.description: The official account of the Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in Vancouver
legacy.name: Chinese Consulate General in Vancouver

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: Mishandling of the Taiwan question will shake the very foundation of China-US relations.

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: Separatism for Taiwan independence is as incompatible with peace and stability of the Taiwan Strait as fire with water.

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: The Chinese people have every right to ask: Why does the US talk at length about respecting sovereignty and territoria…

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: The Chinese people have every right to ask: Why does the US talk at length about respecting sovereignty and territorial integrity on Ukraine, while disrespecting China’s sovereignty and territorial integrity on the Taiwan question?

legacy.description: The official account of the Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in Vancouver
legacy.name: Chinese Consulate General in Vancouver

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: The Taiwan question is the core of the core interests of China, the bedrock of the political foundation of China-US re…

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: The Taiwan question is the core of the core interests of China, the bedrock of the political foundation of China-US relations, and the first red line that must not be crossed in China-US relations.

legacy.description: The official account of the Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in Vancouver
legacy.name: Chinese Consulate General in Vancouver

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: The two sides of the Taiwan Strait belong to one common family, which is called China.

legacy.description: The official account of the Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in Vancouver
legacy.name: Chinese Consulate General in Vancouver

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: We hope the US government will listen to the calls of the two peoples, rid of its strategic anxiety of “threat inflati…

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: We hope the US government will listen to the calls of the two peoples, rid of its strategic anxiety of “threat inflation”, abandon the “zero-sum” Cold War mentality, and refuse to be hijacked by “political correctness”.

legacy.description: The official account of the Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in Vancouver
legacy.name: Chinese Consulate General in Vancouver

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: The China-US relationship should be determined by the common interests and shared responsibilities of the two countrie…

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: The China-US relationship should be determined by the common interests and shared responsibilities of the two countries and by the friendship between the Chinese and American peoples, rather than by US domestic politics or the hysterical neo-McCarthyism.

legacy.description: The official account of the Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in Vancouver
legacy.name: Chinese Consulate General in Vancouver

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: If the US has the ambition to make itself great again, it should also have a broad mind for the development of other c…

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: If the US has the ambition to make itself great again, it should also have a broad mind for the development of other countries. Containment and suppression will not make America great, and it will not stop the rejuvenation of China.

legacy.description: The official account of the Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in Vancouver
legacy.name: Chinese Consulate General in Vancouver

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: If the US does not hit the brake but continues to speed down the wrong path, no amount of guardrails can prevent derai…

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: If the US does not hit the brake but continues to speed down the wrong path, no amount of guardrails can prevent derailing, and there will surely be conflict and confrontation.

legacy.description: The official account of the Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in Vancouver
legacy.name: Chinese Consulate General in Vancouver

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: The so-called “establishing guardrails” and “not seeking conflict” simply means that China should not respond in words…

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: The so-called “establishing guardrails” and “not seeking conflict” simply means that China should not respond in words or action when slandered or attacked. That is just impossible!

legacy.description: The official account of the Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in Vancouver
legacy.name: Chinese Consulate General in Vancouver

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: The US talks a lot about following rules. But imagine two athletes competing in an Olympic race. If one athlete, inste…

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: The US talks a lot about following rules. But imagine two athletes competing in an Olympic race. If one athlete, instead of focusing on giving one’s best, always tries to trip or even injure the other, that is not fair competition but malicious confrontation and a foul!

legacy.description: The official account of the Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in Vancouver
legacy.name: Chinese Consulate General in Vancouver

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: The so-called “competition” means to contain and suppress China in all respects and get the two countries locked in a…

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: The so-called “competition” means to contain and suppress China in all respects and get the two countries locked in a zero-sum game.

legacy.description: The official account of the Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in Vancouver
legacy.name: Chinese Consulate General in Vancouver

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: The US perception and views of China are seriously distorted. It regards China as its primary rival and the biggest ge…

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: The US perception and views of China are seriously distorted. It regards China as its primary rival and the biggest geopolitical challenge. And the result is that the US China policy has entirely deviated from the rational and sound track. https://t.co/gMMMXLlVXt

legacy.description: The official account of the Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in Vancouver
legacy.name: Chinese Consulate General in Vancouver

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: China will keep in mind the interests of the world and take an active part in global governance, and contribute more t…

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: China will keep in mind the interests of the world and take an active part in global governance, and contribute more to world peace and development and to human progress.
